hero.title: Julian Caminaur Fullstack Web Developer
hero.greetingMessage: I’m a full-stack web developer focused on creating clean, reliable, and efficient web solutions. I enjoy bringing ideas to life with a straightforward and professional approach.

about.title: About me
about.paragraph1: I’m a full-stack web developer with experience in building clean, efficient, and reliable digital solutions. Over the years, I’ve worked in different environments, technical teams, customer-oriented roles, and fast-paced workplaces which helped me develop strong problem-solving skills, adaptability, and clear communication.
about.paragraph2: I enjoy learning new technologies and improving my craft through personal projects, challenges, and continuous education. My focus is on writing organized code, understanding the needs behind each task, and delivering solutions that work smoothly in real-world use cases.

rockPaperScissors.title: Rock, Paper, Scissors game
rockPaperScissors.description: Rock, Paper, Scissors game where users play against the computer with a responsive layout and score persistence, including a bonus Rock, Paper, Scissors, Lizard, Spock mode.

restCountriesApi.title: REST Countries API
restCountriesApi.description: App that integrates with the REST Countries API to list countries on the homepage and let users search by name and filter by region.

ipAddressTracker.title: IP Address Tracker
ipAddressTracker.description: IP address tracker that automatically shows the user's own IP location and lets users search IPs or domains to view location details.

productListWithCart.title: Product list with cart
productListWithCart.description: Product list with a fully functional shopping cart where users can add or remove items, update quantities, and confirm their order via a modal.

chatAppCssIllustration.title: Chat app CSS illustration
chatAppCssIllustration.description: Chat app CSS illustration challenge from Frontend Mentor, built with React and Tailwind, focusing on responsive layout and UI animation.

loopStudiosLandingPage.title: Loop Studios Landing Page
loopStudiosLandingPage.description: Responsive marketing landing page for Loop Studios, built mainly with React and Tailwind to closely match the original design.

multiStepForm.title: Multi Step Form
multiStepForm.description: Multi-step form built with React and Tailwind, with step navigation, responsive layout, and validation for user inputs.

mortgageRepaymentCalculator.title: Mortgage Repayment Calculator
mortgageRepaymentCalculator.description: Mortgage repayment calculator that takes loan details and shows monthly payments and total repayment, including validation and keyboard-friendly form.

contactForm.title: Contact Form
contactForm.description: Accessible contact form with validation, success toast, full keyboard navigation, and a responsive layout.

spaceTourismMultiPageWebsite.title: Space Tourism Multi-Page Website
spaceTourismMultiPageWebsite.description: Multi-page space tourism site where users switch between sections via tabs, with responsive layouts and interactive states.

interactiveCardDetailsForm.title: Interactive Card Details Form
interactiveCardDetailsForm.description: Interactive card form that updates card details in real time and validates number, expiry, and CVC with a responsive layout.

eCommerceProductPage.title: E-commerce product page
eCommerceProductPage.description: E-commerce product page with image gallery, lightbox, and cart where users can add, view, and remove items with a responsive layout.

contact.title: Contact Form
contact.subtitle: Feel free to reach out and ask me anything about my work.

message.label: Message
message.placeholder: Tell me briefly about your project or question

success.title: Message received ✅
success.description: Thanks for reaching out, I'll get back to you soon.

DevelopmentActivity.title: Development Activity
DevelopmentActivity.description: The charts are based on data obtained from the GitHub API, which is automatically refreshed once per day.

heatMap.title: Commit Habits by █ Day and Time
heatMap.tooltip2: Average across the analyzed period (not a total).
